entities.name: riddle
entities.description: The main character in the story, also known as Tom Marvolo Riddle. He is described as hesitating and looking unnerved.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and experienced wizard who is guiding Riddle. He is described as asking questions and giving instructions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The narrator of the story, a young boy who is observing Riddle's actions.

entities.name: wardrobe
entities.description: A piece of furniture in the room where the story takes place. It has a door that can be opened.

entities.name: box
entities.description: A small cardboard box on the topmost shelf of the wardrobe. It is described as shaking and rattling.

entities.name: clothes
entities.description: Threadbare clothes hanging on a rail in the wardrobe.

relationships.description: Dumbledore asks Riddle if there is anything in the box that he ought not to have.
Dumbledore tells Riddle to open the box.
